# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-110">중요 한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-113">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-115">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-117">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-118">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-119">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-120">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-121">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-122">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-123">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 연속 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-124">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-128">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-129">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-149">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-151">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-153">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-154">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-155">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-156">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-157">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-158">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-159">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-160">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-163">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-164">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-170">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-170">DNI</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-176">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-177">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-178">뱅크 상태 번호를 포함 하거나 제외 하 고 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-180">계정 번호는 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-181">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-182">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-183">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-184">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-185">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-186">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-189">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-190">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-191">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-193">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-210">오스트레일리아 근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-211">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-212">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-213">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-214">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-215">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-217">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-218">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-220">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-221">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-222">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-223">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-224">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-225">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-226">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-227">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-229">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-232">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-233">Keywords_australian_business_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-235">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-239">근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-239">business number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-242">비즈니스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-242">business id</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-245">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-246">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-247">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-248">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-249">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-250">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-252">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-253">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-254">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-255">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-256">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-257">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-258">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-259">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-260">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-265">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-266">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-268">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-270">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-270">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-271">될</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-271">acn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-273">오스트레일리아 회사 번호 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-273">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-274">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-274">australia company number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-277">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-277">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-278">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-279">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-280">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-282">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-283">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-284">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-285">5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-286">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-287">1 ~ 2 개의 선택적 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-288">4 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-289">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-290">9 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-291">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-292">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-295">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-296">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-297">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-397">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-399">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-401">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-402">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-403">9 번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-404">10 번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-405">11 번째 숫자 (선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-406">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-407">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-410">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-411">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-412">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-424">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-426">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-428">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-429">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-430">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-433">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-434">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-468">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-469">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-470">8 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-472">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백을 사용 하 여 표시 되는 8 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-473">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-474">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-475">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-476">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-477">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-478">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-479">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-480">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-482">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-483">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-484">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-496">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-497">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-498">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-499">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-500">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-501">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-502">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-503">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-505">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-506">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-507">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-634">오스트리아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-634">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-635">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-635">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-636">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-636">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-637">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-637">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-638">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-638">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-639">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-639">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-640">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-640">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-641">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-642">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-642">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-643">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-644">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-644">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="b0491-645">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-645">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-646">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-646">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-647">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-648">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-648">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-649">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-650">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-650">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-651">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-651">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-652">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-652">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-653">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-655">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-655">identity number</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-656">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-658">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-658">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-659">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-661">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-661">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-663">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-663">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-664">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-664">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-665">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-665">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-666">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-666">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-668">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-668">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-671">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-671">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-672">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-672">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-693">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-693">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-694">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-694">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-696">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-696">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-698">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-698">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-699">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-699">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-700">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-700">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-701">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-701">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-702">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-702">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-703">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-703">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-704">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-704">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-705">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-705">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-706">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-706">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-707">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-707">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-708">from 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-708">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-709">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-710">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-710">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-721">보험 코드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-721">insurance code#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-722">사회 alsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-722">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-723">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-723">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-724">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-724">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-725">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-725">versicherungsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-726">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-726">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-727">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-728">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-728">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-730">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-730">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-731">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-731">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-732">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-732">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-733">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-733">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-734">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-734">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-735">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-735">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-736">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-737">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-740">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-740">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-741">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-741">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-742">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-743">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-743">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-744">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-744">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-745">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-745">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-746">österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-746">österreich</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-747">st.nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-747">st.nr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-748">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-748">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-749">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-749">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-750">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-750">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-766">오스트리아 값 추가 된 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-766">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-767">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-767">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-768">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-768">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-769">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-769">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-770">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-770">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-771">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-771">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-772">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-772">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-773">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-774">11 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-774">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-775">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-776">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-776">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-777">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-777">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-778">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-778">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-779">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-779">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-780">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-780">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-781">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-781">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-782">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-782">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-783">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-783">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-784">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-784">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-785">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-785">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-786">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-786">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-787">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-788">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-791">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-791">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-792">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-792">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-794">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-794">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-795">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-795">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-796">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-796">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-799">오스트리아 vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-799">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-800">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-800">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-801">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-801">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-802">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-802">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-803">오스트리아-vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-803">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-804">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-804">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-805">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-805">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-806">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-806">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-807">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-807">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-808">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-808">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-809">vat 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-809">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-810">atu 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-810">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-811">uid 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-811">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-812">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-812">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-813">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-814">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-814">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-815">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-815">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-816">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-816">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-817">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-817">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-818">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-818">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-819">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-819">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-820">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-820">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-821">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-822">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-822">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-823">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-824">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-825">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-825">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-826">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-826">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-827">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-827">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-828">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-828">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-829">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-829">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-830">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-830">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-831">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-831">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-832">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-832">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-833">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-833">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-834">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-834">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-835">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-835">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-836">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-836">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-837">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-837">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-838">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-838">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-839">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-839">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-840">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-840">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-841">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-841">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-842">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-843">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-843">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-844">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-844">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-845">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-845">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-846">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-846">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-847">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-847">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-848">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-848">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-849">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-849">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-850">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-850">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-851">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-851">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-852">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-852">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-853">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-853">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-854">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-854">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-855">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-855">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-856">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-856">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-857">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-857">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-858">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-858">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-859">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-860">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-861">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-862">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-862">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-863">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-863">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-864">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-865">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-865">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-866">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-867">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-867">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-868">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-868">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-869">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-869">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-877">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-877">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-884">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-884">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-885">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-886">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-886">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-887">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-887">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-888">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-889">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-889">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-890">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-890">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-891">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-891">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-892">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-892">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-893">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-893">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-894">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-894">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b0491-895">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-895">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-896">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-896">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-897">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-897">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-898">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-899">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-899">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-900">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-900">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-901">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-901">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-902">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-903">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-903">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-904">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-904">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-905">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-905">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-906">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-906">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-907">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-907">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-908">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-908">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-909">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-909">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-917">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-917">localhost</span></span>
