## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3261">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3261">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3262">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3262">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3263">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3264">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3264">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3265">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3266">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3266">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3267">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3268">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3268">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3270">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3270">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3271">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3271">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3272">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3272">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3396">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3396">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3397">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3397">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3399">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3399">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3401">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3401">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3402">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3402">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3403">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3403">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3404">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3404">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3405">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3406">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3406">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3407">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3407">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3424">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3424">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3426">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3426">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3428">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3428">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3429">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3429">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3430">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3430">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3431">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3431">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3432">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3433">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3435">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3436">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3436">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3437">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3437">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3438">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3438">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3439">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3439">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3440">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3440">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3441">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3441">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3513">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3513">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3514">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3514">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3515">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3516">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3516">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3517">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3518">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3518">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3519">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3519">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3520">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3520">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3521">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3521">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3522">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3523">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3523">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3525">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3525">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3526">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3526">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3527">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3527">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3528">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3529">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3529">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3530">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3530">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3531">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3531">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3532">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3532">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3533">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3533">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3534">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3534">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3535">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3535">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3536">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3536">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3537">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3537">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3538">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3538">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3539">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3539">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3540">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3540">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3541">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3541">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3542">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3542">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3543">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3543">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3544">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3544">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3545">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3545">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3546">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3546">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3547">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3547">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3548">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3548">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3549">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3549">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3550">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3550">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3551">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3552">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3553">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3555">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3555">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3556">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3556">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3557">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3557">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3558">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3558">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3559">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3559">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3560">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3562">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3562">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3564">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3564">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3565">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3565">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3566">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3566">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3567">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3567">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3568">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3568">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3569">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3569">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3570">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3570">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3571">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3571">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3572">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3572">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3698">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3698">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3699">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3699">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3700">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3700">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3701">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3701">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3702">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3702">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3703">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3703">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3704">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3704">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3705">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3706">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3706">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3708">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3708">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3709">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3709">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3710">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3710">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3711">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3711">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3712">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3712">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3714">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3714">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3717">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3717">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3718">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3718">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3719">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3719">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3720">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3720">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3753">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3753">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3754">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3754">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3755">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3756">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3756">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3757">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3758">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3758">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3759">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3760">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3760">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3761">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3763">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3763">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3764">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3764">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3765">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3765">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3766">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3766">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3767">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3767">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3768">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3768">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3769">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3769">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3770">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3770">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3771">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3771">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3772">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3772">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3773">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3773">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3774">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3774">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3775">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3775">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3776">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3776">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3777">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3777">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3778">eesti kodaniku pass si 번호 passinumbrid 문서 번호 문서에 dokumendi veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3778">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3779">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3779">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3781">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3781">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3783">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3783">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3784">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3785">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3785">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-3786">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-3787">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3787">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3788">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3788">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3789">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3789">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3790">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3790">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3791">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3791">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3792">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3792">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3793">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3793">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3794">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3794">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-3795">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-3795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4241">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4241">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4242">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4242">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4243">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4244">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4244">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4245">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4246">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4246">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4247">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4247">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4248">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4248">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4249">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4249">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4250">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4250">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4251">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4252">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4252">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4253">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4254">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4254">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4255">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4255">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4256">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4387">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4387">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4388">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4388">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4389">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4389">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4390">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4390">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4391">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4391">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4392">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4392">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4393">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4393">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4394">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4394">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4395">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4395">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4396">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4396">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4397">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4397">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4398">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4398">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4399">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4399">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4400">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4400">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4401">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4401">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4402">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4402">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4403">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4403">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4404">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4404">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4405">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4405">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4406">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4406">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4407">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4407">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4408">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4408">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4409">ehic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4409">ehic#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4424">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4424">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4426">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4426">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4428">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4428">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4429">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4429">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4430">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4430">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4431">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4431">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4432">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4432">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4433">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4434">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4435">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4436">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4436">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4437">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4437">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4438">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4438">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4439">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4439">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4440">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4440">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4441">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4441">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4442">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4442">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4491">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4491">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4492">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4492">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4493">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4493">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4494">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4494">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4495">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4495">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4496">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4496">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4497">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4497">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4498">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4498">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4499">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4499">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4500">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4500">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4501">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4501">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4502">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4502">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4503">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4503">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4504">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 또는 Keyword_finland_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4504">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4505">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4505">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4507">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4507">passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4509">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4509">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4510">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4510">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4513">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4513">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4514">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4514">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4515">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4515">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4516">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4516">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4525">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4525">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4526">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4527">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4528">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4528">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4529">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4530">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4530">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4531">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4531">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4532">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4532">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4533">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4533">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4534">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4534">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4535">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4535">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4536">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4536">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4537">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4537">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4538">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4539">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4539">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4540">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4541">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4541">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4542">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4542">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4543">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4543">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4545">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4545">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4569">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4569">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4570">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4570">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4571">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4572">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4572">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4573">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4574">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4574">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4575">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4576">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4576">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4577">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4578">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4578">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4579">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4579">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4580">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4580">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4707">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4707">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4708">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4708">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4709">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4709">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4710">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4710">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4711">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4711">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4712">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4712">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4713">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4713">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4714">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4715">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4715">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4716">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4717">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4717">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4718">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4718">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4719">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4719">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4720">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4720">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4721">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4721">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4722">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4722">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4723">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4724">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4724">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4727">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4727">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4728">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4728">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4729">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4729">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4730">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4730">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4731">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4731">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4732">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4732">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4733">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4733">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4734">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4734">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4735">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4736">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4736">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4737">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4738">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4738">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4739">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4740">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4740">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4741">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4742">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4743">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4743">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4744">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4744">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4745">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4745">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4747">card number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4747">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4749">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4749">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4750">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4750">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4751">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4751">cni</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4753">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4753">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4754">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4754">national identity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4757">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4757">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4758">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4758">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4759">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4759">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4760">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4761">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4761">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4762">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4762">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4763">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4763">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4764">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4764">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4765">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4765">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4766">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4766">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4767">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4768">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4770">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4771">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4771">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4772">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4772">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4784">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4784">パスポートのNum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4792">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4792">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4793">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4793">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4794">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4794">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4795">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4796">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4796">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4797">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4798">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4798">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4799">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4799">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4800">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4800">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4801">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4801">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4802">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4803">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4804">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4805">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4805">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4806">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4806">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4807">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4807">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4808">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4810">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4810">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4811">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4811">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4812">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4812">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4826">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4826">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4827">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4827">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4828">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4828">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4838">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4838">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4839">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4840">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4840">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4841">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4842">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4842">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4843">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4843">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4844">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4844">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4845">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4845">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4846">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4846">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4847">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4847">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4848">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4848">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4849">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4849">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4850">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4850">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4851">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4851">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4852">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4852">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4853">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4854">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4854">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4855">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4856">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4856">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4857">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4857">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4858">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4858">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4859">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4859">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4860">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4860">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```
