## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4880">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4880">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4881">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4881">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4882">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4882">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4883">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4883">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4884">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4884">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4885">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4885">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4886">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4886">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4887">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4887">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4888">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4888">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4889">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4889">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4890">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4890">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4891">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4891">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4892">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4892">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4893">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4893">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4894">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4894">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4895">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4895">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4896">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4896">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4897">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4897">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4898">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4898">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4899">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4899">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4900">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4901">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4901">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4902">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4903">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4903">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4904">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4904">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4905">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4905">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4906">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4906">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4907">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4907">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4908">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4908">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4909">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4909">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4910">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4910">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4911">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4911">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4912">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4912">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4913">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4913">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4914">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4914">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4915">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4915">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4916">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4916">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4917">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4917">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4918">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4918">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4919">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4919">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4920">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4920">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4921">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4921">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4922">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4923">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4923">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4924">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4925">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4925">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4926">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4926">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4927">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4927">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4928">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4928">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4929">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4929">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4930">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4930">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4931">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4932">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4932">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-4933">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-4934">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4935">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4935">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4936">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4936">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-4937">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-4937">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5086">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5086">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5087">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5088">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5088">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5089">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5089">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5090">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5090">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5091">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5091">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5092">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5092">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5093">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5093">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5094">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5094">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5095">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5095">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5096">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5096">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5097">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5097">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5098">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5098">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5099">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5099">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5100">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5100">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5101">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5101">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5102">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5102">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5103">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5103">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5104">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5104">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5105">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5105">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5106">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5106">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5107">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5107">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5108">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5108">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5109">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5109">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5110">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5110">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5111">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5111">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5112">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5112">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5113">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5113">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5114">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5114">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5115">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5115">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5116">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5116">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5117">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5117">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5118">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5118">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5119">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5119">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5120">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5120">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5121">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5121">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5122">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5122">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5123">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5123">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5124">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5124">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5125">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5125">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5126">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5126">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5127">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5128">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5128">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5129">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5131">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5131">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5132">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5132">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5133">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5133">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5135">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5135">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5136">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5136">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5137">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5138">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5138">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5139">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5139">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5140">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5140">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5141">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5141">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5142">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5142">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5143">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5143">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5144">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5144">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5145">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5145">Passnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5146">reisepässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5146">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5147">포트 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5147">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5148">포트 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5148">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5149">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5149">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5151">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5151">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5153">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5153">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5154">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5154">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5155">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5155">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5156">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5156">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5157">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5157">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5158">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5158">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5159">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5159">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5160">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5160">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5161">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5161">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5162">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5163">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5163">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5164">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5165">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5165">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5166">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5166">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5167">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5167">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5168">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5168">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5169">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5169">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5195">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5195">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5196">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5196">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5197">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5197">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5198">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5198">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5199">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5199">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5200">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5200">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5201">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5201">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5202">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5203">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5203">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5204">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5205">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5205">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5206">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5206">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5207">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5207">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5208">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5208">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5209">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5210">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5210">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5211">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5212">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5212">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5213">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5213">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5218">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5218">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5219">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5219">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5220">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5220">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5221">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5221">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5222">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5222">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5223">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5223">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5224">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5224">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5225">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5225">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5226">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5226">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5227">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5227">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5228">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5228">mwst</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5230">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5230">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5231">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5231">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5232">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5232">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5234">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5234">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5236">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5236">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5237">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5238">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5238">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5241">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5241">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5242">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5242">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5368">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5368">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5369">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5370">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5370">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5371">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5372">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5372">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5373">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5373">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5374">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5374">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5375">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5375">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5376">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5376">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5377">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5377">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5378">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5378">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5379">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5379">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5380">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5381">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5381">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5382">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5383">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5383">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5384">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5384">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5385">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5385">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5386">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5386">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5387">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5387">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5388">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5388">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5389">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5389">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5390">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5390">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5391">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5391">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5392">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5392">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5393">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5393">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5394">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5394">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5395">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5395">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5396">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5396">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5397">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5397">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5398">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5398">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5399">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5399">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5400">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5401">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5401">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5402">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5403">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5403">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5404">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5404">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5405">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5405">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5406">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5406">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5407">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5407">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5408">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5408">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5409">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5409">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5410">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5410">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5411">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5411">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5412">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5412">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5413">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5413">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5414">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5414">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5415">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5415">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5416">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5416">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5417">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5417">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5418">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5418">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5419">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5419">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5420">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5420">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5421">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5421">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5422">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5422">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5423">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5423">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5424">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5424">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5425">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5425">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5426">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5426">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5427">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5427">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5428">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5428">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5429">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5429">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5430">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5430">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5431">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5431">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5432">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5432">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5433">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5434">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5434">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5435">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5436">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5436">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5437">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5437">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5438">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5438">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5439">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5439">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5440">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5440">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5441">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5441">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5442">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5442">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5451">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5451">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5452">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5452">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5456">세금 레지스트리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5456">tax registry no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5457">세금 레지스트리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5457">tax registry number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5463">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5463">taxnumber</span></span>

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5471">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5471">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5472">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5473">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5473">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5474">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5475">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5475">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5476">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5476">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5477">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5477">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5478">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5478">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5479">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5480">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5482">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5483">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5483">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5484">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5484">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5485">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5485">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5486">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5486">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5487">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5487">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5488">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5528">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5528">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5529">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5530">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5531">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5531">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5533">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5533">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5534">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5534">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5535">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5535">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5536">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5537">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5540">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5541">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5666">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5666">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5667">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5668">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5669">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5670">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5671">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5672">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5673">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5674">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5674">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5675">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5675">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5676">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5676">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5677">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5677">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5678">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5678">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5679">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5679">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5680">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5680">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5681">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5681">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5682">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5682">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5683">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5683">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5684">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5684">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5685">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5685">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5686">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5686">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5687">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5687">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5688">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5688">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5697">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5697">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5698">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5698">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5699">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5699">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5700">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5700">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5701">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5702">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5702">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5703">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5704">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5704">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5705">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5706">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5706">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5707">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5709">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5709">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5710">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5710">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5711">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5711">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5714">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5714">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5715">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5715">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5716">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5716">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5717">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5717">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5719">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5719">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5720">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5720">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5721">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5721">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5722">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5722">passport numbers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5724">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5724">útlevél száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5725">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5725">Útlevelek száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5726">útlevél szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5726">útlevél szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5727">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5727">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5728">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5728">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5729">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5729">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5730">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5730">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5731">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5731">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5732">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5732">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5733">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5734">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5734">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5735">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5736">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5736">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5737">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5737">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5738">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5738">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5739">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5740">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5740">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5760">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5760">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5761">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5761">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5762">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5762">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5763">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5763">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5764">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5764">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5765">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5765">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5766">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5766">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5767">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5767">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5768">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5768">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5769">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5769">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5770">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5770">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5771">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5771">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5772">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5772">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5773">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5773">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5774">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5775">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5775">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5776">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5777">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5777">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5778">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5778">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5779">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5779">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5780">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5780">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5781">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5781">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5782">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5782">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5783">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5783">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5784">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5784">adóazonosító szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5785">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5785">adóhatóság szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5786">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5786">adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5787">헝가리어 언급</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5787">hungarian tin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5788">hungatiantin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5788">hungatiantin#</span></span>
