## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5807">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5807">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5808">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5808">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5809">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5809">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5810">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5810">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5811">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5811">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5812">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5812">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5813">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5813">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5814">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5815">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5815">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5816">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5817">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5817">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5818">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5818">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5819">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5819">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5820">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5820">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5821">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5822">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5823">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5824">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5825">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5825">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5826">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5826">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5827">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5827">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5828">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5828">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5829">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5830">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5830">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5831">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5831">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5832">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5832">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5833">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5833">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5834">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5834">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5835">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5835">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5836">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5836">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5837">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5837">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5838">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5838">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5839">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5839">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5840">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5840">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5841">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5841">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5842">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5842">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5843">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5844">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5844">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5845">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5845">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5846">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5846">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5847">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5847">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5848">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5848">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5849">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5849">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5850">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5851">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5853">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5854">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5854">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5855">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5855">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5856">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5856">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5857">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5857">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5858">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5858">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5859">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5859">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5860">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5860">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5861">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5861">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5862">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5863">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5863">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5864">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5865">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5865">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5866">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5866">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5867">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5867">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5868">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5868">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5869">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5869">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5870">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5870">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5871">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5872">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5872">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5873">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5874">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5874">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5875">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5875">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5876">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5876">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5877">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5877">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5878">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5878">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5879">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5879">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5880">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5881">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5881">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5882">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5882">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5883">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5883">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5884">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5884">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5885">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5885">UID</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5887">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5887">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5888">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5889">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5889">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5890">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5891">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5891">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5892">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5892">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5893">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5893">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5894">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5894">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5895">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5895">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5896">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5896">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5897">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5897">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5898">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5898">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5899">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5899">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5900">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5901">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5901">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5902">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5903">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5903">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5904">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5904">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5905">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5905">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5906">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5906">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5907">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5907">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5908">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5908">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5909">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5909">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5910">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5910">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5911">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5911">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5912">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5912">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5913">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5913">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5914">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5914">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5915">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5915">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5916">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5916">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5917">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5917">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5918">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5918">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5919">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5919">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5920">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5920">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5921">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5921">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5922">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, ,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5922">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5923">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5924">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5924">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5925">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5926">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5926">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5927">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5927">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5928">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5928">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5929">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5929">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5930">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5930">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5931">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5931">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5932">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5933">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5933">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5934">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5935">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5935">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5936">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5937">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5938">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5939">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5940">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5940">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5941">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5941">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5942">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5943">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5943">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5944">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5944">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5945">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5945">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5946">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5946">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5947">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5947">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5948">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5948">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5949">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5949">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5950">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5953">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5953">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5954">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5955">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5955">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5957">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5957">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5958">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5958">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5959">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5959">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5960">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5960">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5961">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5962">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5962">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5967">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5967">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5968">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5968">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5969">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5969">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5970">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5970">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5971">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5971">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5972">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5972">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5973">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5974">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5975">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5977">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5977">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5978">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5978">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5979">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5979">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5980">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5980">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5981">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5981">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5982">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5982">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5983">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5983">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5984">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5984">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5985">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5985">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5986">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5986">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5987">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5987">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5988">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5988">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5989">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5989">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5990">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5990">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5991">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5991">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5992">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5992">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5993">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5993">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5994">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5994">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5995">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5996">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5996">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-5997">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-5998">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5998">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-5999">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-5999">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6000">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6000">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6001">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6002">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6002">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6003">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6004">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6004">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6005">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6005">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6006">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6006">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6130">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6130">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6131">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6132">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6133">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6133">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6135">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6135">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6136">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6136">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6137">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6137">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6138">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6139">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6139">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6140">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6141">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6141">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6142">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6142">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6143">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6143">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6164">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6164">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6165">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6166">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6166">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6167">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6167">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6168">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6168">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6169">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6169">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6171">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6171">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6172">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6172">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6173">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6173">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6174">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6174">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6175">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6175">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6176">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6176">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6177">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6177">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6178">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6179">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6179">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6180">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6181">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6182">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6182">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6183">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6183">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6184">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6184">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6185">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6186">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6186">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6187">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6232">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6232">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6234">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6234">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6236">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6236">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6237">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6238">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6238">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6239">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6240">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6240">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6241">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6241">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6242">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6242">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6243">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6243">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6244">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6245">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6245">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6246">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6247">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6248">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6248">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6249">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6249">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6250">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6250">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6251">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6251">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6252">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6252">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6253">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6253">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6254">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6254">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6255">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6255">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6256">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6256">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6257">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6258">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6258">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6259">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6260">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6260">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6265">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6265">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6266">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6266">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6267">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6267">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6268">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6268">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6269">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6269">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6270">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6270">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6271">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6271">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6272">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6272">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6273">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6273">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6274">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6275">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6275">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6276">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6277">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6277">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6278">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6278">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6279">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6279">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6280">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6280">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6281">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6281">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6282">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6283">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6284">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6285">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6285">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6286">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6286">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6287">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6287">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6288">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6288">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6289">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6289">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6290">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6290">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6291">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6291">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6292">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6292">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6293">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6293">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6294">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6294">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6295">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6295">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6296">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6297">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6298">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6299">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6300">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6301">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6302">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6303">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6303">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6305">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6305">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6306">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6306">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6307">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6307">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6308">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6308">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6309">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6309">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6310">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6310">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6311">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6311">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6312">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6312">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6313">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6314">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6314">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6315">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6316">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6316">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6317">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6317">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6318">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6318">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6319">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6319">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6320">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6320">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6355">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6355">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6356">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6356">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6358">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6358">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6360">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6360">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6361">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6361">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6362">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6362">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6363">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6364">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6364">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6365">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6366">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6367">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6367">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6368">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6368">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6369">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6369">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6370">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6370">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6371">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6371">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6372">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6372">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6373">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6373">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6374">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6374">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6375">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6375">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6376">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6376">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6389">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6389">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6390">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6390">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6391">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6391">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6392">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6392">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6393">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6393">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6394">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6394">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6395">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6395">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6396">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6396">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6397">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6397">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6398">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6398">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6399">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6399">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6400">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6400">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6401">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6401">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6402">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6402">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6403">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6403">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6404">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6404">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6405">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6405">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6406">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6406">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6407">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6407">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6408">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6408">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6409">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6409">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6410">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6410">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6411">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6411">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6413">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6413">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6419">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6419">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6420">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6421">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6421">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6422">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6423">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6423">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6424">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6424">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6425">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6425">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6426">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6426">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6427">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6427">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6428">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6428">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6429">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6430">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6432">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6433">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6433">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6434">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6434">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6435">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6435">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6436">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6436">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6437">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6437">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6438">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6438">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6439">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6439">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6440">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6440">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
