## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6487">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6487">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6488">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6489">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6489">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6490">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6491">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6491">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6492">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6493">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6493">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6494">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6495">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6495">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6496">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6496">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6497">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6497">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6535">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6535">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6536">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6536">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6537">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6537">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6538">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6538">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6539">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6539">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6540">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6540">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6541">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6541">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6542">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6543">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6543">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6544">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6545">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6545">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6546">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6546">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6547">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6547">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6548">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6549">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6549">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6550">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6551">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6552">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6552">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6553">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6553">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6555">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6555">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6556">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6556">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6558">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6558">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6559">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6559">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6560">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6560">共通番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6562">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6562">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6563">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6563">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6564">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6564">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6565">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6565">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6566">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6566">法人番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6568">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6568">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6569">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6569">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6570">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6570">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6571">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6571">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6572">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6572">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6573">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6573">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6574">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6574">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6575">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6576">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6576">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6577">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6578">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6578">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6579">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6579">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6580">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6580">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6581">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6581">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6582">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6582">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6583">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6583">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6584">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6585">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6585">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6587">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6588">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6588">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6589">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6589">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6590">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6590">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6591">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6591">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6596">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6596">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6597">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6597">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6598">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6598">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6599">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6599">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6600">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6600">個人番号カード</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6603">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6603">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6604">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6604">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6605">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6605">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6606">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6606">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6607">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6607">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6608">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6608">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6609">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6610">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6610">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6611">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6612">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6612">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6613">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6613">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6614">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6614">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6615">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6615">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6616">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6616">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6617">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6617">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6618">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6618">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6619">Passport 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6619">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6620">Passport #
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6620">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6621">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6621">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6622">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6622">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6623">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6623">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6624">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6624">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6625">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6625">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6626">パスポートNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6626">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6627">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6627">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6628">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6628">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6629">旅券番号 ♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6629">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6630">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6630">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6631">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6631">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6632">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6633">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6633">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6634">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6635">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6635">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6636">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6636">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6637">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6637">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6638">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6638">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6639">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6640">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6640">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6641">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6642">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6642">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6643">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6643">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6644">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6644">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6645">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6645">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6646">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6646">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6647">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6647">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6648">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6648">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6649">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6649">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6650">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6650">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6651">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6651">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6652">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6652">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6653">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6653">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6654">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6655">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6655">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6657">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6657">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6658">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6659">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6661">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6661">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6662">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6662">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6663">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6663">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6664">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6664">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6665">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6665">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6666">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6666">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6667">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6667">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6668">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6668">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6669">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6669">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6670">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6670">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6671">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6671">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6672">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6672">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6673">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6673">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6674">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6674">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6675">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6675">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6676">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6676">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6677">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6678">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6678">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6679">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6680">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6680">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6681">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6681">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6682">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6682">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6683">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6683">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6684">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6684">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6685">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6686">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6686">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6688">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6688">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6689">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6689">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6690">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6690">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6692">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6692">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6693">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6693">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6714">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6714">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6715">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6715">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6716">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6717">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6717">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6719">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6719">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6720">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6720">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6721">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6721">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6722">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6723">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6723">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6726">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6726">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6727">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6727">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6852">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6852">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6853">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6853">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6854">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6854">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6855">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6855">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6856">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6856">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6857">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6857">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6858">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6858">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6859">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6859">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6860">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6860">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6861">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6861">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6862">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6862">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6863">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6863">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6864">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6864">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6865">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6865">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6866">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6867">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6870">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6870">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6871">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6871">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6873">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6873">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6936">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6936">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6937">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6937">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6938">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6939">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6939">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6941">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6941">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6942">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6942">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6943">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6943">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6947">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6948">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6948">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6949">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6969">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6969">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6970">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6970">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6971">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6972">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6972">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6974">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6974">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6975">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6976">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6976">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-6977">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-6978">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6979">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6979">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-6980">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-6980">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7105">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7105">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7106">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7106">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7107">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7107">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7108">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7108">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7109">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7109">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7110">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7110">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7111">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7111">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7112">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7113">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7113">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7114">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7115">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7115">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7116">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7116">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7117">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7117">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7118">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7118">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7119">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7119">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7120">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7120">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7121">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7121">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7122">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7122">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7123">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7123">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7124">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7124">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7125">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7125">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7126">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7126">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7127">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7127">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7162">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7162">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7163">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7163">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7164">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7165">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7165">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7166">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7167">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7167">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7168">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7169">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7169">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7170">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7171">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7171">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7172">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7172">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7173">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7190">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7190">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7191">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7192">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7193">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7193">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7194">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7195">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7195">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7196">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7197">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7197">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7198">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7199">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7200">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7200">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7201">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7201">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7325">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7325">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7326">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7326">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7327">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7327">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7328">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7328">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7329">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7329">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7330">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7330">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7331">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7331">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7332">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7333">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7333">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7334">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7335">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7335">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7336">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7336">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7337">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7337">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7338">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7339">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7339">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7340">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7341">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7342">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7342">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7343">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7343">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7344">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7345">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7345">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7368">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7368">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7369">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7369">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7370">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7371">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7371">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7372">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7373">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7373">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7374">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7375">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7375">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7376">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7377">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7377">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7378">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7378">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7379">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7379">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7380">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7380">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7385">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7385">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7386">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7386">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7387">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7388">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7388">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7390">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7390">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7391">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7391">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7392">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7392">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7393">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7393">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7394">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7394">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7395">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7395">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7396">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7396">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7397">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7397">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7398">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7398">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7399">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7399">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7400">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7400">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7401">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7401">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7402">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7402">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7403">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7403">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7404">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7404">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7405">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7406">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7406">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7446">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7446">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7447">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7448">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7448">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7450">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7450">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7451">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7451">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7452">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7452">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7453">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7453">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7454">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7454">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7455">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7455">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7456">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7456">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7457">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7458">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7460">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7461">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7461">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7462">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7462">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7489">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7489">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7490">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7490">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7491">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7491">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7492">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7492">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7493">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7494">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7494">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7495">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7495">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7496">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7496">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7497">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7497">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7498">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7498">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7499">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7499">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7500">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7501">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7503">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7504">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7504">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7505">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7505">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7629">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7629">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7630">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7630">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7631">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7631">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7632">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7632">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7633">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7633">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7634">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7634">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7635">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7635">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7636">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7637">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7637">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7638">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7639">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7639">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7640">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7640">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7641">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7641">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7642">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7643">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7643">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7644">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7645">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7646">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7646">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7647">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7647">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7648">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7649">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7649">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
