## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7666">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7666">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7667">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7667">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7668">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7668">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7669">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7669">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7670">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7670">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7671">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7671">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7672">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7673">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7673">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7674">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7675">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7675">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7676">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7676">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7677">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7677">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7678">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7678">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7679">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7679">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7680">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7680">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7681">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7681">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7682">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7682">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7683">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7683">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7684">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7684">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7685">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7685">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7686">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7686">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7687">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7687">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7688">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7688">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7689">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7689">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7690">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7690">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7691">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7691">numru tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7692">numri tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7692">numri tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7693">Nru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7693">Nru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7694">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7694">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7696">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7696">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7697">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7697">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7698">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7698">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7699">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7699">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7700">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7700">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7701">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7701">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7702">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7702">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7703">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7703">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7704">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7704">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7705">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7705">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7706">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7706">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7707">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7707">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7708">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7708">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7709">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7710">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7710">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7711">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7711">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7712">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7712">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7713">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7713">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7746">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7746">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7747">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7747">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7748">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7748">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7749">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7750">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7750">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7751">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7751">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7752">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7752">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7753">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7753">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7754">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7754">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7755">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7755">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7756">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7757">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7757">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7759">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7760">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7760">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7761">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7761">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7762">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7762">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7786">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7786">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7787">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7787">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7788">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7789">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7789">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7791">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7791">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7792">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7793">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7793">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7794">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7796">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7796">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7797">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7797">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7925">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7925">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7926">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7927">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7928">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7928">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7929">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7930">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7930">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7931">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7932">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7932">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7933">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7934">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7935">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7935">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7936">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7936">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7937">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7937">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7940">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7940">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7941">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7941">netherlands passport number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7946">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7946">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7947">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7947">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7948">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7948">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7949">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7949">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7950">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7950">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7951">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7951">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7952">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7952">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7953">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7954">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7954">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7956">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7956">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7957">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7958">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7958">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-7959">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7960">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7960">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7961">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7961">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7962">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7962">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-7963">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7963">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7964">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7964">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7987">세금 확인 tal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7987">tax identification tal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7988">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7988">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7989">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7989">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7990">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7990">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7991">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7991">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7992">세금 tal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7992">tax tal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7993">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7993">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-7994">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-7994">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8002">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8002">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8003">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8003">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8004">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8004">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8005">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8005">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8006">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8006">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8007">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8007">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8008">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8008">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8009">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8010">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8010">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8011">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8012">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8012">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8013">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8013">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8014">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8014">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8015">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8015">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8016">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8016">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8017">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8017">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8018">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8018">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8019">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8019">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8020">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8021">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8021">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8022">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8023">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8023">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8024">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8024">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8025">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8025">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8027">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8027">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8029">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8029">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8030">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8030">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8031">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8031">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8032">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8032">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8033">wearde tafoege 세금 getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8033">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8034">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8034">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8036">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8036">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8037">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8037">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8038">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8038">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8039">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8039">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8040">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8040">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8041">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8041">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8042">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8042">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8043">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8044">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8044">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8045">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8046">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8046">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8047">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8047">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8048">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8048">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8049">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8049">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8050">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8050">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8051">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8051">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8052">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8052">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8053">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8053">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8054">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8054">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8055">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8056">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8056">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8057">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8058">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8058">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8059">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8059">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8060">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8060">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8062">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8062">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8070">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8070">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8071">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8071">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8072">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8072">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8073">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8073">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8074">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8074">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8075">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8075">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8076">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8076">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8077">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8078">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8078">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8080">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8080">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8081">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8081">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8082">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8082">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8083">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8084">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8085">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8086">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8086">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8087">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8087">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8088">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8088">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8089">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8089">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8090">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8090">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8157">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8157">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8158">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8158">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8159">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8159">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8160">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8160">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8161">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8161">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8162">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8162">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8163">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8163">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8164">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8165">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8165">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8166">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8167">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8167">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8168">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8168">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8169">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8169">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8170">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8170">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8171">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8171">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8172">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8172">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8173">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8174">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8174">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8175">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8176">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8176">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8177">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8177">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8178">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8178">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8179">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8179">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8180">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8180">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8189">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8189">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8190">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8191">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8191">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8192">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8193">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8193">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8194">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8195">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8196">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8197">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8198">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8198">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8199">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8199">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8200">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8201">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8201">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8202">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8202">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8203">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8203">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8204">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8204">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8205">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8205">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8206">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8206">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8207">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8207">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8208">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8208">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8209">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8209">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8210">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8210">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8211">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8211">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8212">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8212">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8215">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8215">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8217">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8217">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8218">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8218">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8219">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8219">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8220">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8220">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8221">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8221">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8222">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8222">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8223">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8224">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8224">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8225">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8226">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8226">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8227">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8227">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8228">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8228">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8229">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8229">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8230">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8230">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8231">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8231">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8233">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8233">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8234">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8234">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8235">소셜 welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8235">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8236">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8236">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8237">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8237">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8238">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8238">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8239">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8240">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8240">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8241">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8242">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8242">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8243">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8243">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8244">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8244">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8245">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8245">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8247">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8250">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8250">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8251">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8251">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8252">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8254">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8254">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8255">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8257">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8257">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8264">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8264">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8266">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8266">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8268">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8268">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8269">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8269">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8270">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8270">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8271">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8271">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8272">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8272">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8273">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8273">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8274">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8275">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8275">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8278">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8278">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8279">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8279">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8280">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8280">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8281">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8281">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8282">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8282">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8283">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8283">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8284">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8284">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8285">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8285">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8286">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8286">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8287">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8287">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8288">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8289">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8289">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8290">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8291">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8291">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8292">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8292">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8293">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8293">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8294">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8294">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8295">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8295">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8296">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8296">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8297">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8298">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8298">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8300">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8300">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8301">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8301">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8302">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8302">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8426">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8426">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8427">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8428">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8428">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8429">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8429">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8430">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8430">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8431">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8432">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8432">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8433">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8434">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8435">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8435">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8436">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8436">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8437">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8437">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8438">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8438">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8439">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8439">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8440">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8440">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8441">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8441">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8442">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8442">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8443">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8443">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8445">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8445">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8446">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8446">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8447">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8447">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8448">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8448">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8449">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8449">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8450">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8450">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8451">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8451">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8452">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8452">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8453">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8453">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8454">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8454">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8455">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8456">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8456">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8457">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8458">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8458">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8459">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8459">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8460">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8460">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8461">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8461">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8462">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8463">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8463">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8464">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8464">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8470">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8470">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8471">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8471">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8472">veiligheid-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8472">nr-pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8476">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8476">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8477">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8477">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8478">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8479">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8479">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8480">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8481">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8481">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8482">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8483">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8483">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8484">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8485">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8485">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8486">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8486">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8487">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8487">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8488">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8489">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8490">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8490">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>
