- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8494">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8494">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8495">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8495">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8496">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8496">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8497">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8497">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8498">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8498">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8499">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8499">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8500">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8500">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8501">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8501">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8502">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8502">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8503">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8503">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8504">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8504">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8505">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8505">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8506">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8506">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8507">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8507">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8508">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8508">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8509">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8509">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8510">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8511">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8511">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8512">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8513">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8513">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8514">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8514">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8515">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8515">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8516">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8516">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8517">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8517">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8518">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8518">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8522">통계 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8522">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8523">통계적 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8523">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8524">regon 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8524">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8525">regonid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8525">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8526">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8526">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8527">회사 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8527">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8528">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8528">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8529">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8529">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8530">u r i statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8530">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8531">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8531">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8532">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8532">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8534">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8534">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8535">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8535">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8536">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8536">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8537">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8537">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8538">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8538">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8539">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8539">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8540">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8540">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8541">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8541">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8542">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8542">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8543">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8543">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8544">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8544">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8545">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8546">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8546">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8547">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8548">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8548">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8549">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8549">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8550">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8550">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8580">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8580">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8581">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8582">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8582">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8583">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8584">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8584">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8585">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8586">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8587">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8589">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8589">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8590">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8590">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8609">포르투갈 bi 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8609">portugal bi number</span></span>


## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8610">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8610">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8611">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8611">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8612">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8613">두 개의 패턴-다음에 특수 문자가 있는 5-8 자리 문자 두 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8613">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8614">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8615">패턴 1: 다음에 특수 문자를 포함 하는 5/6 문자 2 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8615">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8616">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8616">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8617">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8617">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8618">5 또는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8618">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8619">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8619">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8620">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8620">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8621">패턴 2:1 개 문자 다음에 특수 문자가 있는 6/8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8621">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8622">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8622">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8623">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8623">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8624">6 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8624">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8625">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8625">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8626">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8626">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8627">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8628">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8629">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8630">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8631">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8631">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8632">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8632">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8764">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8764">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8765">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8766">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8767">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8767">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8768">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8769">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8769">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8770">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8770">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8771">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8771">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8772">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8773">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8773">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8774">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8775">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8776">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8776">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8777">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8777">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8801">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8801">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8802">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8803">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8803">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8804">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8805">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8805">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8806">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8806">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8807">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8807">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8808">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8808">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8809">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8809">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8810">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8811">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8814">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8814">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8815">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8815">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8816">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8816">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8817">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8817">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8842">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8842">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8843">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8843">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8844">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8845">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8845">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8847">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8847">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8848">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8848">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8849">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8849">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8850">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8851">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8851">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8853">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8853">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8854">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8854">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8855">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8855">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8983">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8983">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8984">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8984">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8985">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8985">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8986">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8986">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8987">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8987">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8988">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8988">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8989">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8989">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8990">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8990">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8991">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8991">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8992">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8992">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8993">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8993">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8994">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8994">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8995">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8995">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-8996">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8996">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8997">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8997">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-8998">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8998">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-8999">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-8999">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9000">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9000">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9001">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9001">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9002">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9002">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9003">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9003">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9004">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9004">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9055">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9055">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9056">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9056">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9057">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9058">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9058">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9059">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9060">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9060">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9061">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9061">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9062">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9062">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9063">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9063">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9064">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9065">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9065">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9066">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9066">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9081">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9081">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9082">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9082">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9083">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9083">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9084">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9084">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9085">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9085">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9086">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9086">records management</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9088">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9088">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9089">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9089">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9090">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9090">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9091">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9091">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9092">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9092">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9093">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9093">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9094">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9094">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9095">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9095">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9096">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9096">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9097">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9098">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9098">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9099">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9100">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9101">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9101">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9102">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9102">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9126">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9126">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9128">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9128">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9129">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9129">nine digit number:</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9137">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9137">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9155">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9155">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9156">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9157">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9157">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9159">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9159">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9160">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9161">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9161">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9162">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9163">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9163">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9164">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9164">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9165">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9165">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9172">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9172">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9173">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9174">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9174">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9175">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9176">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9176">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9177">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9177">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9178">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9178">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9179">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9179">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9180">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9181">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9183">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9184">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9184">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9185">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9185">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9186">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9187">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9188">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9188">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9189">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9189">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9200">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9200">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9201">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9201">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9202">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9203">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9203">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9204">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9205">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9205">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9206">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9206">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9207">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9207">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9208">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9209">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9209">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9210">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9211">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9211">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9212">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9212">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9213">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9213">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9339">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9339">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9340">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9340">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9341">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9341">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9342">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9342">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9343">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9343">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9344">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9344">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9345">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9345">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9346">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9347">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9347">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9348">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9348">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9349">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9349">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9350">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9350">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9351">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9351">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9352">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9352">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9353">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9354">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9354">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9355">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9357">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9357">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9358">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9358">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9359">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9359">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9360">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9360">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9407">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9407">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9408">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9408">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9409">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9410">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9410">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9411">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9412">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9412">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9413">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9414">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9414">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9416">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9417">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9417">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9418">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9437">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9437">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9438">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9439">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9440">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9440">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9441">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9442">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9442">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9443">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9444">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9444">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9447">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9447">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9448">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9575">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9575">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9576">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9576">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9577">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9577">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9578">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9578">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9579">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9579">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9580">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9580">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9581">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9581">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9582">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9583">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9583">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9584">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9584">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9585">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9585">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9586">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9586">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9587">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9587">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9588">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9588">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9589">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9589">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9590">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9591">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9591">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9592">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9593">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9593">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9594">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9594">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9595">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9595">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9596">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9596">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9597">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9597">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9625">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9625">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9626">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9626">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9627">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9628">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9628">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9629">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9630">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9630">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9631">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9631">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9632">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9632">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9633">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9633">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9634">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9635">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9635">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9636">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9637">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9637">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9638">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9638">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9639">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9639">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9659">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9659">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9660">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9660">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9661">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9661">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9662">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9662">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9663">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9663">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9664">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9664">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9665">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9665">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9666">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9667">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9667">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9668">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9668">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9669">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9669">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9670">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9670">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9671">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9671">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9672">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9673">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9673">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9674">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9675">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9675">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9676">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9676">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9677">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9677">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9678">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9678">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9679">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9679">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
