## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9703">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9703">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9704">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9705">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9705">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9707">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9707">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9708">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9708">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9709">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9709">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9710">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9710">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9711">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9711">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9712">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9712">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9714">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9717">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9717">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9718">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9718">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9719">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9719">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9720">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9720">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9721">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9721">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9722">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9722">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9723">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9723">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9724">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9724">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9725">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9725">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9726">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9727">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9727">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9728">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9729">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9729">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9730">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9730">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9731">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9731">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9732">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9732">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9733">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9733">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9734">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9734">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9735">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9735">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9736">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9737">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9737">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9740">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9740">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9741">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9741">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9742">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9742">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9744">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9744">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9745">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9745">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9746">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9746">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9747">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9747">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9748">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9748">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9749">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9749">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9750">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9750">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9751">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9751">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9752">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9752">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9753">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9753">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9754">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9754">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9755">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9756">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9756">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9757">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9758">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9758">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9759">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9759">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9760">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9760">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9761">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9762">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9762">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9764">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9765">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9765">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9766">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9767">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9767">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9768">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9768">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9902">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9902">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9903">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9904">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9905">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9906">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9907">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9908">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9909">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9910">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9910">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9911">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9912">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9912">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9913">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9913">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9914">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9914">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9915">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9915">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9916">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9917">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9917">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9918">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9919">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9920">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9920">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9921">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9921">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9922">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9923">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9923">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9947">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9947">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9948">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9948">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9949">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9949">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9950">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9950">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9951">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9951">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9952">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9952">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9953">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9953">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9954">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9954">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9955">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9955">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9956">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9957">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9957">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9958">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9959">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9959">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9960">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9960">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9961">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9961">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9974">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9974">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9975">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9975">libreta pasaporte</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9978">números de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9978">números de pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9979">número de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9979">número de pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9980">números pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9980">números pasaporte</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9984">pasaporte 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9984">pasaporte no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9985">pasaporte n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9985">pasaporte n°</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9987">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9987">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9988">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9988">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9989">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9989">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9990">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9990">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9991">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9991">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9992">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9992">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9993">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9993">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9994">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9994">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9995">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9995">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9996">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9996">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-9997">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9997">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-9998">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9998">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-9999">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-9999">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10000">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10000">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10001">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10001">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10002">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10002">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10003">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10003">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10004">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10004">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10005">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10005">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10006">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10006">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10007">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10008">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10009">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10010">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10011">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10013">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10014">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10014">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10016">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10016">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10017">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10017">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10018">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10018">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10019">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10019">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10020">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10020">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10021">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10021">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10022">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10022">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10023">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10023">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10024">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10024">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10025">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10025">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10026">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10026">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10027">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10027">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10028">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10028">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10029">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10029">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10030">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10030">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10031">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10031">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10032">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10032">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10033">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10033">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10034">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10034">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10035">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10036">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10036">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10037">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10038">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10038">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10039">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10039">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10040">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10040">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10041">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10041">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10042">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10042">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10073">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10073">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10074">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10075">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10075">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10076">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10076">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10077">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10077">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10078">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10078">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10079">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10079">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10080">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10080">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10081">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10081">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10082">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10082">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10083">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10083">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10084">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10084">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10085">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10085">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10086">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10086">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10087">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10087">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10088">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10088">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10089">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10089">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10090">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10090">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10091">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10091">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10092">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10092">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10093">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10093">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10094">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10094">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10095">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10095">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10096">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10096">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10097">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10097">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10098">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10098">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10099">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10099">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10100">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10100">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10101">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10101">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10102">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10102">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10103">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10103">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10104">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10104">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10105">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10105">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10106">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10106">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10119">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10119">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10120">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10120">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10121">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10122">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10122">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10123">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10124">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10124">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10125">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10125">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10126">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10126">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10127">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10127">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10128">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10129">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10129">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10130">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10131">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10132">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10132">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10133">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10133">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10266">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10266">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10267">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10268">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10268">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10270">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10270">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10271">두 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10271">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10272">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10272">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10273">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10273">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10274">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10274">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10275">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10276">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10278">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10278">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10279">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10279">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10280">From 키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10280">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10281">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10282">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10282">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10283">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10283">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10284">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10284">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10303">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10303">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10304">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10304">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10305">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10305">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10306">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10306">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10307">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10307">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10308">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10308">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10309">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10310">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10310">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10311">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10313">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10313">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10314">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10314">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10315">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10315">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10316">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10316">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10347">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10347">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10348">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10348">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10349">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10350">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10350">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10351">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10352">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10352">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10353">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10353">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10354">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10354">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10355">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10355">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10356">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10356">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10357">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10357">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10358">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10359">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10359">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10360">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10361">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10361">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10362">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10362">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10363">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10363">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10365">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10365">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10381">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10381">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10382">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10383">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10384">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10385">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10386">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10387">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10388">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10389">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10389">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10390">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10391">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10391">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10392">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10392">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10393">더하기 기호 또는 빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10393">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10394">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10394">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10395">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10395">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10396">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10396">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10397">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10397">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10398">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10399">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10399">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10401">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10401">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10402">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10402">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10403">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10403">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10404">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10404">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10405">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10405">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10415">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10418">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10418">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10419">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10419">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10420">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10420">tax number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10422">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10422">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10423">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10423">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10431">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10431">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10432">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10433">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10433">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10434">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10435">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10435">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10436">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10436">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10437">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10437">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10438">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10438">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10439">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10439">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10440">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10440">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10441">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10442">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10442">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10443">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10445">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10445">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10446">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10446">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10483">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10483">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10484">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10484">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10485">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10485">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10486">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10486">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10487">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10487">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10488">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10488">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10489">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10489">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10490">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10491">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10491">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10492">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10493">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10493">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10494">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10494">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10495">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10495">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10496">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10496">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10497">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10497">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10498">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10498">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10499">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10499">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10500">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10500">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10501">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10502">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10503">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10504">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10504">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10505">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10505">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10506">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10506">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10507">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10507">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10508">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10508">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10529">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10529">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10530">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10531">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10531">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10533">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10533">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10534">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10534">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10535">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10535">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10536">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10536">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10537">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10538">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10538">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10540">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10541">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10541">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10542">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10542">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10543">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10545">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10545">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10546">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10546">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10555">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10555">身分證號碼</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10558">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10558">國民身分證統一編號</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10563">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10563">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10564">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10564">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10565">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10565">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10566">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10566">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10567">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10567">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10568">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10568">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10569">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10569">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10570">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10570">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10571">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10571">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10572">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10572">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10573">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10574">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10574">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10575">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10576">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10576">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10577">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10577">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10578">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10578">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10583">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10583">Passport no</span></span>
