- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10588">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10588">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10589">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10589">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10590">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10590">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10591">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10591">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10592">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10592">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10593">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10593">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10594">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10594">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10595">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10595">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10596">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10597">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10597">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10598">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10599">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10600">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10600">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10601">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10601">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10602">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10602">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10603">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10603">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10604">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10604">Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10607">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10607">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10608">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10608">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10609">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10609">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10610">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10610">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10611">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10611">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10612">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10612">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10613">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10613">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10614">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10614">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10615">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10615">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10616">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10617">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10617">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10618">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10619">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10619">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10620">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10620">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10621">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10621">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10622">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10623">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10623">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10624">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10625">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10625">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10626">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10626">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10627">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10627">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10628">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10629">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10629">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10630">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10630">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10638">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10638">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10639">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10640">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10641">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10642">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10642">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10643">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10644">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10644">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10645">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10646">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10646">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10647">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10647">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10648">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10648">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10650">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10650">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10651">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10651">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10652">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10652">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10653">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10653">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10654">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10654">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10655">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10655">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10656">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10656">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10657">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10657">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10658">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10658">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10659">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10659">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10661">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10661">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10663">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10663">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10664">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10664">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10665">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10665">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10666">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10666">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10667">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10667">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10668">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10668">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10669">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10670">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10670">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10672">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10673">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10673">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10674">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10674">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10675">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10675">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10685">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10685">motorcycles</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10693">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10693">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10694">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10694">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10696">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10696">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10698">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10698">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10699">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10700">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10700">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10701">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10702">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10702">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10703">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10703">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10704">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10704">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10705">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10705">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10706">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10706">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10709">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10709">electoral register</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10711">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10711">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10712">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10712">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10713">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10714">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10714">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10715">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10715">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10716">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10716">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10717">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10717">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10718">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10718">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10719">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10719">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10720">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10720">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10721">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10721">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10722">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10723">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10723">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10725">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10726">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10726">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10727">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10727">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10728">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10728">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10729">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10729">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10730">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10730">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10731">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10731">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10749">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10749">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10750">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10750">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10751">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10751">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10752">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10753">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10753">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10754">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10755">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10755">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10756">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10756">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10757">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10757">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10758">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10758">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10759">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10759">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10760">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10760">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10761">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10761">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10762">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10762">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10763">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10763">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10764">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10764">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10765">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10765">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10766">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10766">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10767">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10767">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10768">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10768">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10769">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10769">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10770">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10770">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10771">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10771">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10772">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10772">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10773">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10773">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10774">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10774">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10775">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10776">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10776">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10798">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10798">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10799">고유 Taxpayer 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10799">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10800">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10800">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10801">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10801">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10802">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10802">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10803">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10803">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10804">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10804">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10805">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10805">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10806">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10807">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10807">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10809">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10809">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10810">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10811">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10811">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10814">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10814">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10815">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10815">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10816">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10816">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10817">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10817">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10818">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10818">tax number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10820">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10820">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10821">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10821">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10822">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10822">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10823">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10823">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10824">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10824">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10825">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10825">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10826">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10826">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10827">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10827">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10835">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10835">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10836">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10836">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10837">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10837">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10838">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10838">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10839">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10839">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10840">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10841">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10842">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10843">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10843">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10844">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10844">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10845">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10845">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10875">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10875">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10876">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10877">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10877">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10878">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10879">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10879">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10880">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10880">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10881">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10881">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10883">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10886">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10886">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10887">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10887">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10888">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10888">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10889">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10889">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10890">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10890">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10891">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10891">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10892">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10892">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10893">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10893">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10991">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10991">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10992">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10992">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10993">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10993">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-10994">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10994">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-10995">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10995">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10996">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10996">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10997">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10997">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10998">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10998">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-10999">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-10999">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11000">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11000">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11001">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11001">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11002">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11002">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11003">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11003">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11004">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11004">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11005">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11005">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11006">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11006">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11007">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11007">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11008">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11009">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11011">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11012">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11012">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11013">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11013">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11014">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11014">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11015">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11015">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11016">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11016">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11017">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11017">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11018">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11019">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11019">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11020">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11020">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11021">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11021">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11022">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11022">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11023">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11023">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11044">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11044">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11045">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11046">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11046">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11047">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11047">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11048">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11049">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11049">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11050">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11050">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11051">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11051">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11052">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11052">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11053">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11053">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11054">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11055">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11055">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11056">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11057">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11058">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11058">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11059">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11059">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11060">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11061">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11061">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11062">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11062">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11063">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11063">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11064">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11064">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11065">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11065">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11066">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11066">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11067">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11067">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11068">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11068">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11069">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11069">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11071">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11071">SSA Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11073">소셜 보안 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11073">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11074">소셜 보안 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11074">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11075">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11075">social security no</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11083">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11083">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11084">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11084">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11085">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11085">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11086">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11086">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11087">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11088">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11088">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11089">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11090">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11090">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11091">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11092">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11092">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11093">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11094">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11094">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11095">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11095">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11096">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11096">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11117">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11117">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11118">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11118">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11119">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11119">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11120">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11120">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11121">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11121">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11122">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11122">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11123">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11123">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11124">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11125">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11125">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11126">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11127">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11127">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11128">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11129">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11129">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11130">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11131">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11132">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11132">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11133">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11133">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11137">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11137">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11138">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11138">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11140">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11140">номер паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11142">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11142">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11143">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11143">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11144">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11144">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11145">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11145">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11146">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11146">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11147">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11147">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11148">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11148">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11149">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11150">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11150">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11151">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11152">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11152">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11153">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11153">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11154">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11154">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11155">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11155">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11156">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11156">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b0491-11157">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11157">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b0491-11158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11159">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11159">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b0491-11160">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b0491-11160">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
